nodes.text: The Star of Coruscant combat medal was one of the most famous Republic Seal of Service awards bestowed by the Galactic Republic during the time of the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The Star of Coruscant was granted to individuals of the Republic, which outfitted the award with a specialized transponder designed to identify both the recipient and their accomplishments. The award shared its name with the Republic's capital planet, Coruscant.

The Star of Coruscant combat medal was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
